Article.MiniDescription: Sidhi Daatri is worshipped on the 9th day, the Maha Navami day..
Article.Maindescription:
Sidhi Daatri is worshipped on the 9th day, the Maha Navami day. Mother is a giver of all siddhis, namely Anima, Mahima, Garima, Laghima, Prapti, Prakamya, Iishitva and Vashitva. Ma Sidhi Daatri is seated on a lotus and a lion is her mount. Ma adorned in a red saree blesses the entire universe with her 4 arms, holding sangu, chakra, mace and lotus. Her worshippers and devotees are bestowed with Moksha and all the sampath whichever desired by them. Yogis and sadhakas worship Ma Sidhi Daatri for achieving all chakras and siddhis.
